definition: to breathe/to suck in/to absorb/to inhale
to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: The absorbed dose was calculated using the primary and scatter kernels.
sentences.chinese: 再用能量沉积核函数计算吸收剂量。

sentences.english: It can be utilized to measure absorbed doses in radiation processing.
sentences.chinese: 可用于测量辐射加工现场的吸收剂量。

sentences.english: PURPOSE To design a programme to analyse radiation absorbed dose.
sentences.chinese: 设计及应用一项分析辐射吸收剂量的软件。

sentences.english: the cumulative amount or dose of radiation.
sentences.chinese: 受辐射累计量或吸收剂量。

sentences.english: The quantification of absolute activity in vivo is necessary procedure of estimating the absorbed dose of organ or tissue.
sentences.chinese: 器官组织的绝对活度定量是吸收剂量估算的必要步骤。

sentences.english: The gel fraction increases with absorbed dose.
sentences.chinese: 随着吸收剂量的增大，凝胶含量增加。

sentences.english: The depth distributions of absorbed dose in Silicon have been obtained.
sentences.chinese: 得到了硅中吸收剂量对深度的分布。

definition: sievert (Sv), unit of radiation damage used in radiotherapy

pinyin: fang4 she4 xing4 tong2 wei4 su4

definition: electron volt (unit of energy used in particle physics, approximately 10^-19 Joules)
